      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void acceptableAtomicStatement(AtomicStatement statement, List<String> rangeTags, List<String> setTags, AttributeCheck attributeCheck)
      Check that a statement is acceptable
      static void acceptableRequest(QualifiedRequest request)
      Check that a request is acceptable: That range statements are only on the attributes "dob", "idiDocIssuedAt" or "idDocExpiredAt" That membership statement are only on the attributes "Country of residence", "Nationality", "IdDocType" or "IdDocIssuer" That attribute tags are not reused within a credentialStatement

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • acceptableRequest

        public static void acceptableRequest(QualifiedRequest request)
                              throws AcceptableRequest.NotAcceptableException
        Check that a request is acceptable: That range statements are only on the attributes "dob", "idiDocIssuedAt" or "idDocExpiredAt" That membership statement are only on the attributes "Country of residence", "Nationality", "IdDocType" or "IdDocIssuer" That attribute tags are not reused within a credentialStatement
        Parameters:
        input - the request that should be checked
        Throws:
        AcceptableRequest.NotAcceptableException - if the request is not acceptable

      • acceptableAtomicStatement

        public static void acceptableAtomicStatement(AtomicStatement statement,
                                             List<String> rangeTags,
                                             List<String> setTags,
                                             AttributeCheck attributeCheck)
                                      throws AcceptableRequest.NotAcceptableException
        Check that a statement is acceptable
        Parameters:
        statement - the statement that should be checked
        rangeTag - the attribute tags that may be used for range statements
        setTags - the attribute tags that may be used for set statements
        attributeCheck - custom check on the value of the statement.
        Throws:
        AcceptableRequest.NotAcceptableException - if the request is not acceptable
